author: Den Shabalin
title: Fixes an issue #128: ``Response not working with lxml''. This error happend due to lxml's attempt to do .geturl() call on the response object. __getattr__ didn't raise AttributeError so ``response.geturl'' returned None and ``response.geturl()'' resulted into ``TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not callable'' seen in the issue.
